4316880.name: Maev
4316880.description:
A 2D RPG with distinct combat and platforming mechanics to handle simultaneously : use your floating orb to fight and protect you, whilst your character evades and advances through the level. The game is difficult, and mastering the movement options is crucial to beat the 30 levels, fit for speedrunning and scattered with lore and poetry.

Explore what Maev has done to the world after humans went extinct, discover new places and download new emotions to upgrade your weapon. Unravel what happened before your arrival, what Maev is and its objectives.

Find your place, and explore your condition alongside the orb, in a world full of a literary references from a time of which nothing else remains.
4316880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
